title: Synthesis, microstructural and optical characterizations of sol-gel grown gadolinium doped cerium oxide ceramics
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,15455-15467
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01902D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
S. D. Dhruv, Jayant Kolte, Pankaj Solanki, Milind P. Deshpande, Vanaraj Solanki, Jiten Tailor, Naveen Agrawal, V. A. Patel, J. H. Markna, Bharat Kataria, D. K. Dhruv
In this study, through the utilization of the sol–gel combustion tactic, gadolinium (Gd)-doped cerium oxide (CeO2), Ce1−xGdxO2 (x = 0.00, 0.10, 0.20 and 0.30 (GDC)) ceramics were attained.
